文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: Corrosion of Zircaloy-4 is accelerated in water or steam above about 350°C when LiOH is present in sufficient concentrations
腐蚀数据: accelerated rate (up to 100x pure water rate)
额外性质: {"hydrogen_pickup_fraction": "~60%", "critical_Li_concentration": "~100 ppm in oxide", "environment": "LiOH solutions 310-415°C, Li up to 375 ppm"}

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: Kass [1] measured the corrosion and hydrogen pickup of Zircaloy-2 in concentrated LiOH solutions at 315 and 360°C

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: Murgatroyd and Winton [2] found the corrosion rate of Zircaloy-2 to increase significantly at 300°C in LiOH solutions
腐蚀数据: 2x with 5 g/L LiOH, 100x with 72 g/L LiOH

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: Coriou et al. [3] investigated the effect of LiOH, NaOH, KOH, and NH4OH upon the corrosion of Zircaloy
腐蚀数据: LiOH causes largest increase, NH4OH no effect

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: Hillner and Chirigos [5] found no effect of LiOH on the corrosion rate of Zircaloy-2 and Zircaloy-4 for times up to 100 days at 360°C
腐蚀数据: no effect at 0.002M, slight effect at 0.005M, large increases at ≥0.06M
额外性质: {"oxide_scale_penetration": "quickly penetrated by LiOH", "alternative_salts": "lower corrosion with LiNO3, Li2SO4, Li2CO3"}

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk1
证据片段: McDonald et al. [6] measured the effect of LiOH on the corrosion rate of Zircaloy-4 at 316, 343 and 360°C
腐蚀数据: enhanced corrosion at 0.01M LiOH approaching 100 days, rapid increase at 0.1M
额外性质: {"lithium_saturation": "140 ppm in oxide at 0.01M, 900 ppm at 0.1M", "critical_level": "~100 ppm lithium in oxide"}

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_037_chunk2
证据片段: Manolescu et al. [9] have compared the acceleration effect of LiOH on Zircaloy-2 and Zr-2.5Nb for 0.0005M to 1M LiOH solutions
